name: Boss Slayer
description:
Welcome to "Boss Slayer"! The Princess was captured and taken to a castle protected by BOSSES.

Your objective is to save her by killing with your Swords the 4 BOSSES protecting the Castle. This won't be easy...

After saving the Princess, you unlock the Hardcore Difficulty, Infinite Mode and BOSS Rush Mode.

It is possible to skip a BOSS by pressing M in the Game Over screen, just in case you're stuck.

The most challenging thing you can do in this game is beating BOSS Rush Mode in Hardcore Difficulty. If you manage to do it, congrats!

Play the game to learn more about it!

Now stop reading this and save the Princess, she is waiting for you!
